greeting.text: Hello human! I am Robot 1. How can I assist you today?

options.text: How do I get out of here?

place_info.text: This is a research facility. We were working on advanced AI, but something went wrong...

problem_info.text: The AI systems became unstable. Some robots may turn hostile if the emergency button is pressed.

escape_info.text: The exit is on the top floor. You can use the elevator to get there.

greeting.text: GREETINGS HUMAN. I AM MAINTENANCE UNIT #42. MY SYSTEMS ARE FUNCTIONING WITHIN NORMAL PARAMETERS.

options.text: Where can I find a keycard?
I'll leave you to your work.

strange_info.text: ANOMALIES DETECTED IN CENTRAL CONTROL. SECURITY PROTOCOLS HAVE BEEN MODIFIED. CAUTION IS ADVISED.

options.text: Is there a safe way out?

keycard_info.text: ACCESS CARDS ARE LOCATED IN SECURITY OFFICE ON LEVEL 2. CURRENT SECURITY CHIEF: DAVIS.

options.text: How do I get to level 2?

level2_info.text: USE ELEVATOR IN EAST WING. WARNING: SOME AREAS MAY BE RESTRICTED WITHOUT PROPER AUTHORIZATION.

escape_info.text: EMERGENCY EXIT LOCATED IN NORTH SECTOR. REQUIRES LEVEL 3 CLEARANCE. ALTERNATIVE: MAINTENANCE TUNNELS IN SUBLEVEL B.

tunnels_info.text: ACCESS POINT NEAR COOLING SYSTEMS. CAUTION: AUTOMATED DEFENSE SYSTEMS MAY BE ACTIVE.
